file_insights.description: Added aria-label attributes to four IconButton components for improved accessibility

patterns_discovered.description: Added aria-label attributes that match or align with existing title attributes on IconButtons
All action buttons received descriptive aria-labels matching their functional purpose
Accessibility improvements isolated to one component file without cross-file dependencies

gotchas_discovered.description: Close drawer button (line 392) initially lacked aria-label, corrected in implementation
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Added descriptive aria-label to close button

gotchas_discovered.description: Both title and aria-label attributes provide same information; not ideal but acceptable for backwards compatibility
gotchas_discovered.note: Could be refactored to use aria-label only in future accessibility cleanup

key_success_factors: Consistent labeling pattern across all buttons
No complex logic or dependencies involved

recommendations.recommendation: Audit remaining IconButtons throughout codebase for aria-label coverage
recommendations.rationale: Follow up on this pattern across other pages and components

recommendations.recommendation: Consider consolidating title and aria-label attributes or using aria-label exclusively
recommendations.rationale: Reduce attribute redundancy while maintaining full accessibility support

recommendations.recommendation: Add accessibility testing (axe-core or similar) to CI/CD pipeline
recommendations.rationale: Prevent future accessibility regressions in similar components

recommendations.recommendation: Establish accessibility review checklist for IconButton implementations
recommendations.rationale: Catch missing aria-labels before merge in future PRs
